title: "Related work"

In this page you can find a collection of software and initiatives that, in our view, are related to the principles behind the Analysis Results Data Model. If you want to find more about the principles, please [check our paper](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41597-022-01789-2).

-   Observational Medical Outcomes Partnership (OMOP) Common Data Model
    -   [Website](https://www.ohdsi.org/data-standardization/)
